11132111.content:
It started when Max and Chloe were shooting things in the junkyard. Chloe missed her target, being hit in the stomach.
Knowing the risk, Max used her powers to save Chloe from it happening, not realizing what was about to happen to her.
"Max?"
"I, uh."
"What happened?"
Max explained everything to her then, all of it.
"No way."
"Yeah."
She had to use it again later, saving Chloe's life once more. First, it was pissing herself, as Chloe had put it, and spare clothes had helped.
This time, Chloe noticed something was wrong by the foul smell.
"Not again!."
Max had pooped herself this time.
"That's it."
Chloe soon left to get protection for Max.

12431121.content:
while Max was diapering Chloe, she went on to explain the general rules with Chloe as well as the guideline the princaple gave that Chloe will be brought back as a student if she gets through the assignment but will forfeit the chance if she backs out at any time.

Rule 1: the "baby" will be required to use the diaper at all times whenever she needs to go.

Rule 2: the assignment will last for an entire week and Chloe has to refer to Max as "mommy".

Rule 3: naptime areas have been made for the "babies" since the dorms at Blackwell are made for one person each so Max will be at Chloe's house when the "baby" is put down for the night.

Rule 4: when going out to resteraunts, the "babies" can only order off of the kids menu.

Rule 5: if the "baby" breaks any rules, misbehaves, or uses bad words "mommy" has the right to punish the "baby" any way she see's fit.

Rule 6: the baby cannot bathe or dress herself, she has to have her mommy's help.

were there any other rules?

1553121122.content: It was arranged for Chloe to be the oldest. She soon began to help Max by...
1553121122.title: Chloe is oldest

15531211222.content: Did Chloe get in the bath with Kate?
15531211222.title: Helping with her bath.

155312112221.content: Chloe soon helped Kate to relax as both were bathed. Afterwards, was Kate dressed first?
155312112221.title: Yeah

1553121122211.content: What does Kate get dressed in?
1553121122211.title: Yeah.

15531211222111.content: She was dressed in that, as well as a diaper. Chloe was soon in the same outfit?
15531211222111.title: A onesie

1553121122212.content: What is Chloe dressed in?
1553121122212.title: It was Chloe.

15531211222122.content: Does Chloe fight as her new mommy dresses her?
15531211222122.title: A baby dress

155312112222.content: She helped to wash her sister's hair?
155312112222.title: Something else

155313.content: Hmmm. Max uses her time powers to turn both back into babies so she can mother them?
155313.title: Something else

info.brief_description: Turn the ladies of LIS into big babies.
info.description:
Make the girls from the video game Life Is Strange into babies any way you like.
Rules.

1: No insulting religion.
2: No killing anyone off.
3: Make the chapters as long as you can.
4: No ending stories suddenly.
5: Have fun!.
